page.title: 11GAMES,TOYS AND RECREATIONS
page.content: { Games}vary with the age of children. For example, older boys play football or catching while older girls play netball or catching.Younger boys also might play football and younger girls play skipping or houses. { Toys}played by most children are electronic games or board games. For example,Monopoly,Yahtzee,Connect 4,or Ludo.Younger children sometimes play with fluffy toys,Actionmen and dolls. Electronic games are usually based on current crazes like BMX's and Star Wars. We did a survey on which is the most popular{recreation.}It came out as football first,gymnastics second and swimming third.We did a survey to find out how much TV people watch in a week.On average it was 30 hours. Some{hobbies}are stamp and rubber collecting.
